SEARCH
Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4.model

Class Beverage

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.model.MenuItem
com.example.project4.model.Beverage
public class Beverage extends MenuItem
Represents a beverage item on the menu with a size, flavor, and quantity. This class calculates the price based on the size and quantity of the beverage.
Author:
Yakelin Melendez-Gonzalez, Nivedha Sundar

      quantity - The quantity of beverages ordered.

  • Method Details

    • price

      public double price()
      Calculates the price of the beverage based on its size and quantity. The price is determined by the size of the beverage, and then multiplied by the quantity.
      Specified by:
      price in class MenuItem
      Returns:
      The total price of the beverage.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this beverage to another object for equality. Two beverages are considered equal if they have the same quantity, size, and flavor.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare this beverage to.
      Returns:
      true if the two beverages are equal, false otherwise.
